title: EnO tAmadittAi
sahitya:
EnO tAmadittAi IshanE enadu muraigaLai anudinam kETTumE


anupallavi

  jnAnOdaya guruvAga mun vandE para mOna sAdhanam sholli mutti neri kATTa


caraNam    manamO cancala shEi Ashai adanai mayakkiDum vancakap-pEi sinamE en 
peru nOi Anavam adai dinamum vaLarttiDum tAi inda vAL arakkargaL vendu 
nIrAgak-kanal sindu neTrik-kaN kATTi vandennai ATkoLLa
